#summary Notepad - Yet another version of Google's example app.

= Introduction =

The default tutorial application for Android is called [http://developer.android.com/resources/tutorials/notepad/index.html NotePad], and everybody and their dog has made a version of it. And obviously, so have I.

This version has a preference to set text size, to search, and the ability to send the note.
